name: Infested (B Ray Games)
description:
Infested: The Game

It is a very high graphics single level version of a first person shooter zombie hunter game . The game is made through unreal engine.

You are a swat who have got stuck in  a forest after going through a sweeper mission in the city. In order to go back the city you have to cross the forest in total darkness in aid of the flashlight attached to your gun. On your way back to the city you encounter an unknown danger which you have never ever encountered before. You need to find your way to the city and eliminate any dangers you encounter

System Requirements

Windows - Windows XP (or higher), DirectX 9

Now available for linux too!!

Install instructions

The zip file is to be downloaded and extracted. Be sure that the pak file is present. Run the application named as fps (The one with the infested logo) and enjoy!!

In case you get the following error message:

download the latest version of the dll file from the link: https://www.dll-files.com/x3daudio1_7.dll.html   Extract the zip file downloaded in the SAME LOCATION AS THAT OF THE FPS APPLICATION
